entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Blowing snow at times. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 23.
